publications: [{"title":"Machine Learning Framework: Competitive Intelligence and Key Drivers Identification of Market Share Trends Among Healthcare Facilities","subtitle":"ICHA 2023 - London","date":"January 23, 2023","description":"Received Best Presentation Award"},{"title":"A Hybrid Trust Model for Cloud Service Provider Selection with NLP Support and Malicious Feedback Filtering Mechanism","subtitle":"IEEE","date":"July 7, 2021"},{"title":"Integration of Blockchain, Open RAN and IoT Platforms into Rural Community Networks","subtitle":"ICSDTIR'2021","date":"March 10, 2021","description":"Received Best Paper Award"},{"title":"The Role of Machine Learning in Networks and Network Security","subtitle":"OpenSourceForYou","date":"March 1, 2021"},{"title":"Docker: Build, Ship and Run Any App, Anywhere","subtitle":"OpenSourceForYou","date":"February 1, 2020","description":"An article for installing Docker in Linux. Also contains information about variousDocker features like Docker Hub, Docker Images, Docker Daemon and a lot more.It also explains how to create a Dockerfile and execute them."},{"title":"Creating Custom Themes in Drupal 8","subtitle":"Open Source For You","date":"October 1, 2019","description":"An article on custom theme development in Drupal 8 for websites. projects: [{"title":"A Hybrid Trust Model for Cloud Service Provider Selection","start_date":"Jul 2020","end_date":"Jun 2021","description":"Final Year Project - A Hybrid Trust Model for selecting Cloud Service Providers based on User Requirements and Collaborative Filtering. Also integrated with NLP support for user-friendly requirement gathering along with a Malicious Feedback Filtering Mechanism."},{},{},{},{"title":"Dynamic Consistency Models for Replicated Database Systems","start_date":"Feb 2020","end_date":"Jul 2020","description":"Implemented various consistency algorithms in Java for a Replicated database system with multiple readers and writers. It uses JDBC and RMI for communication amongst the processes and for database connectivity."},{"title":"Live Gesture Recognition","start_date":"May 2020","end_date":"Jun 2020","description":"Live Gesture Recognition is an application that captures and interprets human gestures as numbers."},{"title":"Port Field Collection Table","start_date":"Jan 2019","end_date":"Apr 2019","description":"Field Collection Table is a module which provides both a table formatter and a widget for the Field Collection Entity. Port the Drupal 7 module to Drupal 8 configurations."},{"title":"Port Commerce Instamojo to Drupal 8.","start_date":"May 2018","end_date":"Sep 2018"},{"title":"Resume Builder","start_date":"Jun 2018","end_date":"Aug 2018","description":"A java based Resume Builder that creates a resume file taking information throughresponsive User Interface forms, made by using Swings. Uses Java DatabaseConnectivity API for storing the intermediate information from fields and forms."}]
